title: Champ Select Bug
body: I'm not sure if this is on my end. Basically, if I were to alt-tab in Ranked champ select (draft mode), the champ select would bug out. The timer (regardless of whose picking), proceeds to 0 and during the time, I can't see any continuation of the draft on my end. After it hits 0, the chat would say that my other four teammates have left and I get disconnected from PvP. Finally, I get booted into the main menu where I suffer lp loss and a queue time penalty. Help? (Besides the obvious: Don't alt-tab; since I look up match-ups and masteries). Thanks.

replies.body: When you are in champion select, the server groups everyone together and moves them over.  It seems that you're having a connection problem that's causing you to de-sync and get left behind.  Your best bet would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
well i have the same poblem but i checked the network it was perfectly fine
